DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the safety and tolerability of NI-0401 and whether NI-0401 can reverse BpACR.
DOC.brief_title: NI-0401 in Patients With Acute Renal Allograft Rejection
DOC.criteria: Main inclusion Criteria: evidence of cellular rejection in a renal biopsy according to Bannff 97 criteria rise in Serum Creatinine concentration by >20% compared to baseline value Main previous therapy with antiCD3 mAB(OKT3) or antilymphocytes polyclonal antibodies (ATG, Atgam) patients with cardiac insufficiency or fluid overload severe HLA sensitization (>50% panel reactive antibodies prior transplantation) defined concomitant disease
